document.heading: AN URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, ENACTED PURSUANT TO CALIFORNIA GOVERNMENT CODE SECTION 65858 APPROVING AN ADDITIONAL 6 MONTH MORATORIUM PROHIBITING OUTDOOR CULTIVATION, PROCESSING, MANUFACTURE, DISTRIBUTION, TESTING AND SALE OF MARIJUANA IN ALL ZONING DISTRICTS IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON PENDING REVIEW AND POSSIBLE AMENDMENT OF MUNICIPAL CODE REGULATIONS; AND SETTING FORTH THE FACTS CONSTITUTING SUCH URGENCY
